title: VS2019 debug output filled with crappy messages
body:
Created the environment.txt that contains:
MONO_LOG_LEVEL=error
MONO_LOG_MASK=gc
Set the build action to Android Environment

AND STILL CAN NOT GET RID OF THESE ANNOYING LINES:
[monodroid-assembly]     ZIP: local header offset: 35499804; data offset: 35499912; file size: 1683384
 [monodroid-assembly] /data/app/Mono.Android.DebugRuntime-kjbSvJffIh6KuLyEXW4fQQ==/base.apk entry: assemblies/netstandard.dll
 [monodroid-assembly]     ZIP: local header offset: 37183296; data offset: 37183408; file size: 90624
 [monodroid-assembly] /data/app/Mono.Android.DebugRuntime-kjbSvJffIh6KuLyEXW4fQQ==/base.apk entry: typemap.jm
 [monodroid-assembly]     ZIP: local header offset: 37274032; data offset: 37274128; file size: 1304780
 [monodroid-assembly] /data/app/Mono.Android.DebugRuntime-kjbSvJffIh6KuLyEXW4fQQ==/base.apk entry: typemap.mj

Completely messing up the debug output, filling with unnecessary crap.

IS THERE A SOLUTION FOR THIS WELL-KNOWN BUG????????

nodes.body:
Team Triage: We believe this is an issue with Visual Studio, not MSBuild. Can you [open a feedback ticket instead](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/feedback-options)?

After it's created, that will open an internal bug which will be routed to the right team. If you post the link here we may be able to help that process go faster.
